# mathblock

```````````````````````````````` example
# Heading

$$\alpha\beta*2^{3i}$$

Next paragraph
.
<h1>Heading</h1>
<div class="mathexpr">\alpha\beta*2^{3i}</div><p>Next paragraph</p>
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example
# Heading

$$ \alpha\beta*2^{3i} $$

Next paragraph
.
<h1>Heading</h1>
<div class="mathexpr">\alpha\beta*2^{3i}</div><p>Next paragraph</p>
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example
Initial Text
$$\alpha\beta*2^{3i}$$
.
<p>Initial Text<div class="mathexpr">\alpha\beta*2^{3i}</div></p>
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example
$$\alpha\beta*2^{3i}$$
Next paragraph
.
<div class="mathexpr">\alpha\beta*2^{3i}</div><p>Next paragraph</p>
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example
# Heading

$$\alpha
\beta
*2^{3i}$$

Next paragraph
.
<h1>Heading</h1>
<div class="mathexpr">\alpha
\beta
*2^{3i}</div><p>Next paragraph</p>
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example
# Heading

$$ \alpha
\beta
*2^{3i} $$

Next paragraph
.
<h1>Heading</h1>
<div class="mathexpr">\alpha
\beta
*2^{3i}</div><p>Next paragraph</p>
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example
$$\alpha
\beta
*2^{3i}$$
Next paragraph
.
<div class="mathexpr">\alpha
\beta
*2^{3i}</div><p>Next paragraph</p>
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example
# Heading
$$\alpha
\beta
*2^{3i}$$
Next paragraph
.
<h1>Heading</h1>
<div class="mathexpr">\alpha
\beta
*2^{3i}</div><p>Next paragraph</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
This should be on a separate line : $$\\alpha\\beta*2^{3i}$$ This line should be standalone on a new line.
.
<p>This should be on a separate line :<div class="mathexpr">\\alpha\\beta*2^{3i}</div> This line should be standalone on a new line.</p>
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example
This should be on a separate line : $$ \\alpha\\beta*2^{3i} $$ This line should be standalone on a new line.
.
<p>This should be on a separate line :<div class="mathexpr">\\alpha\\beta*2^{3i}</div> This line should be standalone on a new line.</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
This should be on a separate line : $$ \\alpha
      \\beta
    *2^{3i} $$ This line should be standalone on a new line.
.
<p>This should be on a separate line :<div class="mathexpr">\\alpha
      \\beta
    *2^{3i}</div> This line should be standalone on a new line.</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
Test single character

$$k$$

Math block.
.
<p>Test single character</p>
<div class="mathexpr">k</div><p>Math block.</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
Test single character

$$ k $$

Math block.
.
<p>Test single character</p>
<div class="mathexpr">k</div><p>Math block.</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
Test single character
$$ k $$
Math block.
.
<p>Test single character<div class="mathexpr">k</div>
Math block.</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
Test single character:$$ k $$-Math block.
.
<p>Test single character:<div class="mathexpr">k</div>-Math block.</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
I have some money $$.
.
<p>I have some money $$.</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
I have all sorts of $$$$.
.
<p>I have all sorts of $$$$.</p>
````````````````````````````````
